content.text: Match ends, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 2, Chelsea 1.
Second Half ends, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 2, Chelsea 1.
Goal!  Bayer 04 Leverkusen 2, Chelsea 1. Manuel Friedrich (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) header from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Gonzalo Castro with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Conceded by José Bosingwa.
Sidney Sam (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Alex (Chelsea).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match  (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Florent Malouda (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Gonzalo Castro (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Attempt missed. Didier Drogba (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Florent Malouda.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Bastian Oczipka replaces Stefan Kießling.
Foul by Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea).
Bernd Leno (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Chelsea. John Obi Mikel replaces Raul Meireles.

Goal!  Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1, Chelsea 1. Eren Derdiyok (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) header from the right side of the six yard box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Sidney Sam.
